narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Cep America LLC is a Physician Assistant provider based in Indianapolis, IN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $28.6M in Medicaid payments across 422K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $28.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
